Name: Lunar Cycles Unending
Title: Azhdaha: Lunar Cycles Unending
Desc: "Today is the day... We settle this now!"
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against Azhdaha at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

Talent.Name: Lunar Cycles Unending
Talent.Desc: $[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2602]</color>, play this card on them. Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126022]</color> to $[A2602], then create 1 Elemental Die for each Elemental Type your characters have.\n(Deck must contain $[A2602] to add this card to it)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C126022.Name: Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization
C126022.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character takes {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> DMG:</color> If this character currently has not absorbed the power of this element, remove this effect, and then this character performs $[K1012].

K1012.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Absorption</color>
K1012.Desc: Azhdaha can absorb the power of {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>. (Only 1 can be absorbed at any one time)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When Azhdaha has absorbed any of the above Elements:</color> Based on the type of Element that was absorbed, gain the skills {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Frostspike Wave</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Torrential Rebuke</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Blazing Rebuke</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Thunderstorm Wave</color>.
